sqlMap.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT /*+ FIRST_ROWS */ QUERY.*, ROWNUM RN FROM ( SELECT ET.EVENT_CD , ET.COMP_CD , ET.DISP_NM , ET.EV_DAY_CNT , ET.EV_NIGHT_CNT , ET.START_DAY , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(ET.START_DAY,'yyyyMMdd'), 'DY', 'NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE=KOREAN') "START_WDAY" , ET.START_TIME , ET.START_PYUN , ET.END_DAY_FR , ET.END_TIME_FR , ET.END_DAY , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(ET.END_DAY,'yyyyMMdd'), 'DY', 'NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE=KOREAN') "END_WDAY" , ET.END_TIME , ET.END_PYUN , ET.START_DAY_TO , ET.START_TIME_TO , ET.TRFF_CD , TR.TRFF_KNM "CD_NM" , ET.TRFF_CD_SHORT , ET.FEE_SEQ , PRICE.ADULT_PRICE , PRICE.CHILD_PRICE , PRICE.BABY_PRICE , TO_CHAR(PRICE.ADULT_PRICE, 'Fm999,999,999,990') AS STR_ADULT_PRICE, TO_CHAR(PRICE.CHILD_PRICE, 'Fm999,999,999,990') AS STR_CHILD_PRICE, TO_CHAR(PRICE.BABY_PRICE, 'Fm999,999,999,990') AS STR_BABY_PRICE, PRICE.ETC_PRICE_TITLE1 , PRICE.ETC_PRICE1 , PRICE.ETC_PRICE_TITLE2 , PRICE.ETC_PRICE2 , PRICE.ETC_PRICE_TITLE3 , PRICE.ETC_PRICE3 , TO_CHAR(PRICE.ETC_PRICE1, 'Fm999,999,999,990') AS STR_ETC_PRICE1, TO_CHAR(PRICE.ETC_PRICE2, 'Fm999,999,999,990') AS STR_ETC_PRICE2, TO_CHAR(PRICE.ETC_PRICE3, 'Fm999,999,999,990') AS STR_ETC_PRICE3, PRICE.ADULT_PRICE+PRICE.ETC_PRICE1 AS TOT_AMT1, PRICE.CHILD_PRICE+PRICE.ETC_PRICE2 AS TOT_AMT2, PRICE.BABY_PRICE+PRICE.ETC_PRICE3 AS TOT_AMT3, TO_CHAR(PRICE.ADULT_PRICE+PRICE.ETC_PRICE1, 'Fm999,999,999,990') AS STR_TOT_AMT1, TO_CHAR(PRICE.CHILD_PRICE+PRICE.ETC_PRICE2, 'Fm999,999,999,990') AS STR_TOT_AMT2, TO_CHAR(PRICE.BABY_PRICE+PRICE.ETC_PRICE3, 'Fm999,999,999,990') AS STR_TOT_AMT3, ET.EV_INWON , ET.MIN_INWON , ET.PROC_CD , ET.LOCK_UNIT , NVL(ET.TC_CNT,0) "TC_CNT" , NVL(ET.POINT_RATE, 0.0) "POINT_RATE" , NVL(ET.POINT_AMT, 0) "POINT_AMT" , ET.ET_ADM_CD , NVL ( ( SELECT COUNT(RES_SEQ) FROM RV_ROSTER RS, RV_MST RV WHERE (RS.CANC_CD IS NULL OR RS.CANC_CD = '') AND RV.RES_CD =RS.RES_CD AND ET.EVENT_CD = RV.EVENT_CD GROUP BY EVENT_CD ), 0) "RV_CNT" , TAG.IMG_PATH "IMG_URL" , TAG.EVENT_TAG "GOODS_TAG_TEXT" , NVL(ET.CONF_YN,'N') "CONF_YN" , NVL(ET.CONF_LAND,'N') "CONF_LAND" , NVL(ET.CONF_AIR,'N') "CONF_AIR" , NVL(ET.CONF_INSU,'N') "CONF_INSU" , NVL(ET.CONF_HOTEL,'N') "CONF_HOTEL" , ET.GOODS_TYPE_CD "GOODS_TYPE_CD",
NVL(ET.EMP_RATE, 0) "EMP_RATE", ET.GOODS_JOIN_CD "GOODS_JOIN_CD", ET.BIZ_INSU_YN "BIZ_INSU_YN", ET.PKG_INSU_YN "PKG_INSU_YN", ET.GUIDE_YN "GUIDE_YN", GD.DESC_FILE_PATH "DESC_FILE_PATH", GD.DESC_FILE_NM "DESC_FILE_NM", GD.GOODS_CD "GOODS_CD", ECI.CLAUSE_FG "OPT_DESC" , ECI.CLAUSE_DESC "PRO_DESC"
FROM (SELECT ETM.* FROM ET_MST ETM, (SELECT EVENT_CD FROM CTG_EVENT WHERE CTG_SEQ = #ctg_seq# ) EVC WHERE ( ETM.EVENT_CD = EVC.EVENT_CD(+) AND EVC.EVENT_CD IS NULL) AND (ETM.EV_CAN_CD IS NULL OR ETM.EV_CAN_CD != '99') ) "ET", ET_PRICE "PRICE", GD_MST "GD", CO_CD_TRAFFIC TR, ( SELECT MAX(EVENT_CD) "EVENT_CD" , ltrim(XMLAGG(XMLELEMENT(EVENT_TAG, '|'||EVENT_TAG) ORDER BY EVENT_TAG).EXTRACT('//text()').GetStringVal(),'|')AS EVENT_TAG, ltrim(XMLAGG(XMLELEMENT(IMG_PATH, '|' ||IMG_PATH) ORDER BY IMG_PATH).EXTRACT('//text()').GetStringVal(),'|') AS IMG_PATH
FROM (
SELECT TAG.EVENT_CD , TAG.EVENT_TAG , TAG.IMG_PATH FROM ET_DET_TAG TAG WHERE TAG.EVENT_CD = #event_cd# ) GROUP BY EVENT_CD ) TAG , ET_CLAUSE_INFO ECI WHERE ET.EVENT_CD=PRICE.EVENT_CD AND ET.FEE_SEQ =PRICE.FEE_SEQ AND ET.GOODS_CD =GD.GOODS_CD AND ET.COMP_CD =GD.COMP_CD AND GD.GOODS_CD = #goods_cd# AND GD.COMP_CD = #comp_cd# AND ET.EVENT_CD =TAG.EVENT_CD(+) AND ET.TRFF_CD_SHORT = TR.TRFF_CD_SHORT(+) AND ET.EVENT_CD = ECI.EVENT_CD(+)
AND ET.EVENT_CD = #event_cd#
) QUERY WHERE ROWNUM <= #endRow# ) WHERE RN >= #startRow#

SELECT COUNT(*) totalCnt FROM (SELECT ETM.* FROM ET_MST ETM, (SELECT EVENT_CD FROM CTG_EVENT WHERE CTG_SEQ = #ctg_seq# ) EVC WHERE ( ETM.EVENT_CD = EVC.EVENT_CD(+) AND EVC.EVENT_CD IS NULL) AND (ETM.EV_CAN_CD IS NULL OR ETM.EV_CAN_CD != '99') ) "ET", ET_PRICE "PRICE", GD_MST "GD", CO_CD_TRAFFIC TR, ( SELECT MAX(EVENT_CD) "EVENT_CD" , ltrim(XMLAGG(XMLELEMENT(EVENT_TAG, '|'||EVENT_TAG) ORDER BY EVENT_TAG).EXTRACT('//text()').GetStringVal(),'|')AS EVENT_TAG, ltrim(XMLAGG(XMLELEMENT(IMG_PATH, '|' ||IMG_PATH) ORDER BY IMG_PATH).EXTRACT('//text()').GetStringVal(),'|') AS IMG_PATH
FROM (
SELECT TAG.EVENT_CD , TAG.EVENT_TAG , TAG.IMG_PATH FROM ET_DET_TAG TAG WHERE TAG.EVENT_CD = #event_cd# ) GROUP BY EVENT_CD ) TAG , ET_CLAUSE_INFO ECI WHERE ET.EVENT_CD=PRICE.EVENT_CD AND ET.FEE_SEQ =PRICE.FEE_SEQ AND ET.GOODS_CD =GD.GOODS_CD AND ET.COMP_CD =GD.COMP_CD AND GD.GOODS_CD = #goods_cd# AND GD.COMP_CD = #comp_cd# AND ET.EVENT_CD =TAG.EVENT_CD(+) AND ET.TRFF_CD_SHORT = TR.TRFF_CD_SHORT(+) AND ET.EVENT_CD = ECI.EVENT_CD(+)
SELECT GOODS_CD , SEQ , IMG_TITLE , SAVE_FILE_NM , GOODS_DESC , IMG_PATH , DISP_GRADE FROM GD_IMG WHERE GOODS_CD= #goods_cd# ORDER BY DISP_GRADE ASC

SELECT A.EVENT_CD "EVENT_CD", A.COMM_SEQ "COMM_SEQ", A.COMM_CD "COMM_CD", A.COMM_DESC "COMM_DESC", A.COMM_NUM "COMM_NUM", A.COMM_YN "COMM_YN", /** B.DET_SEQ "DET_SEQ", **/ B.COMM_DESC_DET "COMM_DESC_DET", B.IMG_TITLE "IMG_TITLE", B.IMG_PATH "IMG_PATH", B.IMG_DESC "IMG_DESC", B.IMG_LINK "IMG_LINK", B.IMG_POP_YN "IMG_POP_YN", B.ETC1 "ETC1", B.ETC2 "ETC2", B.ETC3 "ETC3", B.ETC4 "ETC4", B.ETC5 "ETC5", B.COMM_TYPE "COMM_TYPE", B.INS_DT "INS_DT", B.INS_ID "INS_ID", B.UPD_DT "UPD_DT", B.UPD_ID "UPD_ID" FROM RN_ET_SCHD_COMM A, RN_ET_SCHD_COMM_DET B WHERE A.EVENT_CD = B.EVENT_CD(+) AND A.COMM_SEQ = B.COMM_SEQ(+) AND A.EVENT_CD = #event_cd# ORDER BY B.COMM_SEQ ASC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT /*+ FIRST_ROWS */ QUERY.*, ROWNUM RN FROM ( SELECT EVAL.GOODS_EVAL_SEQ "GOODS_EVAL_SEQ", EVAL.GOODS_NM "GOODS_NM", EVAL.GOODS_CD "GOODS_CD", EVAL.EVAL_TITLE "EVAL_TITLE", EVAL.EVAL_CNTS "EVAL_CNTS", EVAL.EVAL_AVG "EVAL_AVG", EVAL.TOUR_GOAL_CD "TOUR_GOAL_CD", FN_SY_CD_DET_S01('TRPP', TOUR_GOAL_CD) "CD_NM", EVAL.GOODS_TYPE_CD "GOODS_TYPE_CD", FN_SY_CD_DET_S01('GDTYPE', GOODS_TYPE_CD ) "CD_NM01", EVAL.AREA_CD "AREA_CD", FN_SY_CD_DET_S01('AREATYPE', AREA_CD ) "CD_NM02", EVAL.READ_CNT "READ_CNT", EVAL.RECOMMEND_CNT "RECOMMEND_CNT", EVAL.DISP_YN "DISP_YN", EVAL.CUST_CD "CUST_CD", EVAL.CUST_NM "CUST_NM", CU.ID "LOTTE_ID", EVAL.TEL "TEL", EVAL.MEMO "MEMO", EVAL.DEL_YN "DEL_YN", EVAL.INS_DT "INS_DT", EVAL.INS_ID "INS_ID", EVAL.UPD_DT "UPD_DT", EVAL.UPD_ID "UPD_ID" , NVL(POINT1.EVAL_POINT, 0) EVAL_POINT1, NVL(POINT2.EVAL_POINT, 0) EVAL_POINT2, NVL(POINT3.EVAL_POINT, 0) EVAL_POINT3, NVL(POINT4.EVAL_POINT, 0) EVAL_POINT4, EVAL.SATISFACTION "SATISFACTION" FROM DI_GOODS_EVAL EVAL , CU_MST CU , (SELECT POINT.EVAL_ITEM_CD, POINT.EVAL_POINT, POINT.GOODS_EVAL_SEQ FROM DI_GOODS_EVAL_POINT POINT, DI_GOODS_EVAL EVAL WHERE EVAL.GOODS_CD = #goods_cd# AND EVAL.GOODS_EVAL_SEQ = POINT.GOODS_EVAL_SEQ AND POINT.EVAL_ITEM_CD = '01' )POINT1 , (SELECT POINT.EVAL_ITEM_CD, POINT.EVAL_POINT, POINT.GOODS_EVAL_SEQ FROM DI_GOODS_EVAL_POINT POINT, DI_GOODS_EVAL EVAL WHERE EVAL.GOODS_CD = #goods_cd# AND EVAL.GOODS_EVAL_SEQ = POINT.GOODS_EVAL_SEQ AND POINT.EVAL_ITEM_CD = '02' )POINT2 , (SELECT POINT.EVAL_ITEM_CD, POINT.EVAL_POINT, POINT.GOODS_EVAL_SEQ FROM DI_GOODS_EVAL_POINT POINT, DI_GOODS_EVAL EVAL WHERE EVAL.GOODS_CD = #goods_cd# AND EVAL.GOODS_EVAL_SEQ = POINT.GOODS_EVAL_SEQ AND POINT.EVAL_ITEM_CD = '03' )POINT3 , (SELECT POINT.EVAL_ITEM_CD, POINT.EVAL_POINT, POINT.GOODS_EVAL_SEQ FROM DI_GOODS_EVAL_POINT POINT, DI_GOODS_EVAL EVAL WHERE EVAL.GOODS_CD = #goods_cd# AND EVAL.GOODS_EVAL_SEQ = POINT.GOODS_EVAL_SEQ AND POINT.EVAL_ITEM_CD = '04' )POINT4 WHERE EVAL.GOODS_CD = #goods_cd# AND EVAL.GOODS_EVAL_SEQ = POINT1.GOODS_EVAL_SEQ AND EVAL.GOODS_EVAL_SEQ = POINT2.GOODS_EVAL_SEQ AND EVAL.GOODS_EVAL_SEQ = POINT3.GOODS_EVAL_SEQ AND EVAL.GOODS_EVAL_SEQ = POINT4.GOODS_EVAL_SEQ AND EVAL.CUST_CD = CU.CUST_CD AND EVAL.DEL_YN = 'N' AND DISP_YN != 'N' ORDER BY EVAL.GOODS_EVAL_SEQ DESC ) QUERY WHERE ROWNUM <= #endRow# ) WHERE RN >= #startRow#

SELECT COUNT(*) totalCnt FROM DI_GOODS_EVAL EVAL , CU_MST CU , (SELECT POINT.EVAL_ITEM_CD, POINT.EVAL_POINT, POINT.GOODS_EVAL_SEQ FROM DI_GOODS_EVAL_POINT POINT, DI_GOODS_EVAL EVAL WHERE EVAL.GOODS_CD = #goods_cd# AND EVAL.GOODS_EVAL_SEQ = POINT.GOODS_EVAL_SEQ AND POINT.EVAL_ITEM_CD = '01' )POINT1 , (SELECT POINT.EVAL_ITEM_CD, POINT.EVAL_POINT, POINT.GOODS_EVAL_SEQ FROM DI_GOODS_EVAL_POINT POINT, DI_GOODS_EVAL EVAL WHERE EVAL.GOODS_CD = #goods_cd# AND EVAL.GOODS_EVAL_SEQ = POINT.GOODS_EVAL_SEQ AND POINT.EVAL_ITEM_CD = '02' )POINT2 , (SELECT POINT.EVAL_ITEM_CD, POINT.EVAL_POINT, POINT.GOODS_EVAL_SEQ FROM DI_GOODS_EVAL_POINT POINT, DI_GOODS_EVAL EVAL WHERE EVAL.GOODS_CD = #goods_cd# AND EVAL.GOODS_EVAL_SEQ = POINT.GOODS_EVAL_SEQ AND POINT.EVAL_ITEM_CD = '03' )POINT3 , (SELECT POINT.EVAL_ITEM_CD, POINT.EVAL_POINT, POINT.GOODS_EVAL_SEQ FROM DI_GOODS_EVAL_POINT POINT, DI_GOODS_EVAL EVAL WHERE EVAL.GOODS_CD = #goods_cd# AND EVAL.GOODS_EVAL_SEQ = POINT.GOODS_EVAL_SEQ AND POINT.EVAL_ITEM_CD = '04' )POINT4 WHERE EVAL.GOODS_CD = #goods_cd# AND EVAL.GOODS_EVAL_SEQ = POINT1.GOODS_EVAL_SEQ AND EVAL.GOODS_EVAL_SEQ = POINT2.GOODS_EVAL_SEQ AND EVAL.GOODS_EVAL_SEQ = POINT3.GOODS_EVAL_SEQ AND EVAL.GOODS_EVAL_SEQ = POINT4.GOODS_EVAL_SEQ AND EVAL.CUST_CD = CU.CUST_CD AND EVAL.DEL_YN = 'N' AND DISP_YN != 'N' ORDER BY EVAL.GOODS_EVAL_SEQ DESC

SELECT * FROM ( ( SELECT 'group11' AS GROUP_ID, /** 시간 도시 **/ '11' AS SUB_GROUP, A11.DIVISION, TO_CHAR(A11.KEY_SEQ) AS KEY_SEQ, A11.EVENT_CD, A11.GOODS_CD, A11.COMP_CD, A11.SECT_SEQ, A11.DAY_CNT, TO_CHAR(A11.SEQ) AS SEQ, TO_CHAR(A11.ORDERS) AS ORDERS, A11.INS_DT, A11.INS_ID, A11.UPD_DT, A11.UPD_ID, A11.CONTINENT_CD, A11.CONTINENT_KNM, A11.CONTINENT_ENM, A11.COUNTRY_CD, A11.COUNTRY_KNM, A11.COUNTRY_ENM, A11.CITY_CD, A11.CITY_KNM, A11.CITY_ENM, A11.TITLE, A11.AMPM, A11.HOUR, A11.MINUTE, TO_CLOB('') AS OLE, (SELECT SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.START_DAY, 'YYYYMMDD')+(A11.DAY_CNT-1), 'yyyymmdd'),1,4) FROM ET_MST A WHERE EVENT_CD = A11.EVENT_CD) AS IMG_TITLE1, (SELECT SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.START_DAY, 'YYYYMMDD')+(A11.DAY_CNT-1), 'yyyymmdd'),5,2) FROM ET_MST A WHERE EVENT_CD = A11.EVENT_CD) AS IMG_PATH_LOCAL1, (SELECT SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.START_DAY, 'YYYYMMDD')+(A11.DAY_CNT-1), 'yyyymmdd'),7,2) FROM ET_MST A WHERE EVENT_CD = A11.EVENT_CD) AS IMG_PATH_SERVER1, (SELECT TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.START_DAY, 'YYYYMMDD')+(A11.DAY_CNT-1),'DY','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE=korean') FROM ET_MST A WHERE EVENT_CD = A11.EVENT_CD) AS IMG_ALT1, '' AS IMG_LINK_URL1, '' AS TARGET_TYPE1, '' AS IMG_TITLE2, '' AS IMG_PATH_LOCAL2, '' AS IMG_PATH_SERVER2, '' AS IMG_ALT2, '' AS IMG_LINK_URL2, '' AS TARGET_TYPE2, '' AS IMG_TITLE3, '' AS IMG_PATH_LOCAL3, '' AS IMG_PATH_SERVER3, '' AS IMG_ALT3, '' AS IMG_LINK_URL3, '' AS TARGET_TYPE3, '' AS AREA_INFO_TYPE_CD, '' AS AREA_INFO_SEQ, '' AS OP_CD,'' AS KNM, '' AS DETAIL_NM, '' AS IMG_PATH, '' AS IMG_PATH_WEB, '' AS IMG_TITLE, '' AS INFO_DESC, '' AS NOTIFY_TYPE_SCHEDULE_NAME, '' AS ETC, '' AS AREA_CD, '' AS OPTION_CD, '' AS OPTION_NM, '' AS IMG_TITLES, '' AS IMG_PATHS, '' AS INFO_DESCS, '' AS PLACE_NM, '' AS DETAIL_INTRO, '' AS DETAIL_CNTS1, '' AS DETAIL_CNTS2, '' AS DETAIL_CNTS3, '' AS PRICE_INFO, '' AS INCLUDE_DESC
FROM GD_SCHD_DET A95 WHERE 1=1 AND A95.GOODS_CD = #goods_cd# AND A95.COMP_CD = #comp_cd# AND A95.SECT_SEQ = (SELECT A11.SECT_SEQ
FROM RN_GROUP_11 A11 WHERE 1=1 AND A11.EVENT_CD = #event_cd# AND A11.DIVISION = 'E' AND ROWNUM < 2)
)
) )

C.OP_CD "OP_CD" , /** --해외국내구분 **/ C.LODGE_CD "LODGE_CD" , /** --숙박업체코드 **/ C.LODGE_CLASS_CD "LODGE_CLASS_CD" , /** --숙박업체분류코드 **/ C.LODGE_NM "LODGE_NM" , /** --숙박업체 이름 **/ C.LODGE_KNM "LODGE_KNM" , /** --숙박업체 이름 **/ C.LODGE_GRADE "LODGE_GRADE" , /** --숙박업체 등급 **/ C.CHECKIN_TIME "CHECKIN_TIME" , /** --체크인시간 **/ C.CHECKOUT_TIME "CHECKOUT_TIME" , /** --체크아웃시간 **/ C.PARLOR_CNT "PARLOR_CNT" , /** --객실수 **/ C.FLOOR_CNT "FLOOR_CNT" , /** --층수 **/ C.ADDRESS "ADDRESS" , /** --상세주소 **/ C.PHONE_NO "PHONE_NO" , /** --전화번호 **/ C.FAX_NO "FAX_NO" , /** --팩스번호 **/ C.HOMEPAGE_URL "HOMEPAGE_URL" , /** --홈페이지주소 **/ C.LOCATION_DESC "LOCATION_DESC" , /** --위치상세설명 **/ C.DIST_TO_AIRP "DIST_TO_AIRP" , /** --근처공항까지의 거리 **/ C.RENT_CAR_YN "RENT_CAR_YN" , /** --렌트카데스크 유무 **/ C.GOLF_YN "GOLF_YN" , /** --골프시설 유무 **/ C.HANDICAP_YN "HANDICAP_YN" , /** --장애인시설 유무 **/ C.HEALTH_CLUB_YN "HEALTH_CLUB_YN" , /** --헬스클럽 유무 **/ C.MEETING_ROOM_YN "MEETING_ROOM_YN" , /** --회의실 유무 **/ C.PARKING_YN "PARKING_YN" , /** --주차장 유무 **/ C.POOL_YN "POOL_YN" , /** --수영장 유무 **/ C.RESTAURANT_YN "RESTAURANT_YN" , /** --레스토랑 유무 **/ C.SAUNA_YN "SAUNA_YN" , /** --사우나 유무 **/ C.GIFT_SHOP_YN "GIFT_SHOP_YN" , /** --선물용품 유무 **/ C.BUSINESS_YN "BUSINESS_YN" , /** --비즈니스센터 유무 **/ C.CASINO_YN "CASINO_YN" , /** --카지노 유무 **/ C.TENNIS_YN "TENNIS_YN" , /** --테니스코트 유무 **/ C.BARBER_SHOP_YN "BARBER_SHOP_YN" , /** --이발소 유무 **/ C.BEAUTY_SHOP_YN "BEAUTY_SHOP_YN" , /** --미용실 유무 **/ C.ENTERTAINMENT_YN "ENTERTAINMENT_YN" , /** --엔터테인먼트 유무 **/ C.COFFEE_SHOP_YN "COFFEE_SHOP_YN" , /** --커피샵 유무 **/ C.USE_YN "USE_YN" , /** --사용여부 N:사용안함 Y:사용함 **/ C.EVAL_POINTS "EVAL_POINTS" , /** --평점 **/ C.REC_YN "REC_YN" , /** --추천여부 **/ C.REC_ORDER "REC_ORDER" , /** --추천순위 **/ C.HIT_YN "HIT_YN" , /** --인기여부 **/ C.HIT_ORDER "HIT_ORDER" , /** --인기순위 **/ C.PRIZE "PRIZE" , /** --가격 **/ C.HOTEL_DESC "HOTEL_DESC" , /** --호텔정보 **/ (SELECT CD_NM FROM SY_CD_DET WHERE GRP_CD='HTGRD' AND CD = C.LODGE_GRADE ) AS HOTEL_GRADE, IM.IMG_TITLES "IMG_TITLES" , IM.IMG_PATHS "IMG_PATHS" , IM.INFO_DESCS "INFO_DESCS" , C.ADD_FACIL "ADD_FACIL" , C.TRAFFIC "TRAFFIC" , C.IMG_NM "IMG_NM" , C.IMG_ALT "IMG_ALT" , d.DET_SEQ "DET_SEQ" , d.COMM_DESC_DET "COMM_DESC_DET" , d.IMG_TITLE "IMG_TITLE" , d.IMG_PATH "IMG_PATH" , d.IMG_DESC "IMG_DESC" , d.IMG_LINK "IMG_LINK" , d.IMG_POP_YN "IMG_POP_YN" , d.COMM_TYPE "COMM_TYPE" FROM DI_CITY A, DI_COUNTRY B, DI_HOTEL_INFO C, DI_HOTEL_INFO_DET D, (SELECT MAX(OP_CD) "OP_CD", MAX(CITY_CD) "CITY_CD" , MAX(LODGE_CD) "LODGE_CD" , LTRIM(MAX(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(IMG_TITLE, '|')), '|') "IMG_TITLES" , LTRIM(MAX(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(IMG_PATH, '|')), '|') "IMG_PATHS" , LTRIM(MAX(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(INFO_DESC, '|')), '|') "INFO_DESCS" FROM (SELECT IMG.IMG_TITLE , IMG.IMG_PATH , IMG.INFO_DESC , IMG.OP_CD , IMG.CITY_CD , IMG.LODGE_CD , HT.COUNTRY_CD , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY IMG.OP_CD, IMG.CITY_CD, IMG.LODGE_CD ORDER BY IMG.OP_CD, IMG.CITY_CD, IMG.LODGE_CD) AS "ROW_ID" FROM DI_HOTEL_IMG "IMG" , DI_HOTEL_INFO "HT" WHERE IMG.USE_YN='Y' AND IMG.OP_CD =HT.OP_CD AND IMG.CITY_CD =HT.CITY_CD AND IMG.LODGE_CD=HT.LODGE_CD --AND IMG.CITY_CD=:CITY_CD /*DYNAMIC_KEYWORD*/
AND HT.OP_CD = #op_cd#
AND HT.CITY_CD = #op_cd#
AND HT.LODGE_CD = #lodge_cd#
) START WITH ROW_ID = 1 CONNECT BY PRIOR ROW_ID = ROW_ID -1 AND PRIOR OP_CD =OP_CD AND PRIOR CITY_CD =CITY_CD AND PRIOR LODGE_CD =LODGE_CD
GROUP BY OP_CD, CITY_CD, LODGE_CD, COUNTRY_CD ) "IM"
WHERE A.CITY_CD = C.CITY_CD AND B.COUNTRY_CD = C.COUNTRY_CD AND C.OP_CD = D.OP_CD(+) AND C.CITY_CD = D.CITY_CD(+) AND C.LODGE_CD = D.LODGE_CD(+) AND IM.OP_CD(+) =C.OP_CD AND IM.CITY_CD(+) =C.CITY_CD AND IM.LODGE_CD(+)=C.LODGE_CD /*DYNAMIC_KEYWORD*/
AND C.OP_CD = #op_cd#
AND C.CITY_CD = #city_cd#
AND C.LODGE_CD = #lodge_cd#
ORDER BY D.DET_SEQ ASC

SELECT /*+'PWdi_area_infoDAOV00.view'*/ A.AREA_INFO_TYPE_CD "AREA_INFO_TYPE_CD" , /** --지역정보유형 **/ A.AREA_INFO_SEQ "AREA_INFO_SEQ" , /** --지역정보번호 **/ A.OP_CD "OP_CD" , /** --해외국내구분 **/ A.CITY_CD "CITY_CD" , /** --도시코드 **/ CT.CITY_KNM "CITY_KNM" , A.COUNTRY_CD "COUNTRY_CD" , /** --국가코드 **/ CON.COUNTRY_KNM "COUNTRY_KNM" , A.DETAIL_NM "DETAIL_NM" , /** --한글상세정보명 **/ A.DETAIL_INTRO "DETAIL_INTRO" , /** --한글상세정보소개 **/ A.DETAIL_CNTS1 "DETAIL_CNTS1" , /** --한글상세정보내용1 **/ A.DETAIL_CNTS2 "DETAIL_CNTS2" , /** --한글상세정보내용2 **/ A.DETAIL_CNTS3 "DETAIL_CNTS3" , /** --한글상세정보내용3 **/ A.KNM "KNM" , /** --한글명칭 **/ A.PLACE_NM "PLACE_NM" , /** --현지어명칭 **/ A.ADDR "ADDR" , /** --주소 **/ A.TEL "TEL" , /** --전화번호 **/ A.PATH "PATH" , /** --가는방법/간단일정 **/ A.URL "URL" , /** --홈페이지 **/ A.BUS_TIME "BUS_TIME" , /** --영업시간/이용시간/여행기간 **/ A.BUS_OFF_DAY "BUS_OFF_DAY" , /** --휴무일 **/ A.ADMISSION "ADMISSION" , /** --입장료 **/ A.COST "COST" , /** --이용료/요금/가격대/예상비용 **/ A.TIP "TIP" , /** --이용 TIP **/ A.REMARK "REMARK" , /** --비고/준비물 **/ A.USE_YN "USE_YN" , /** --사용여부 **/ IM.IMG_TITLES "IMG_TITLES" , IM.IMG_PATHS "IMG_PATHS" , IM.INFO_DESCS "INFO_DESCS" FROM DI_AREA_INFO A , (SELECT MAX(AREA_INFO_TYPE_CD) "AREA_INFO_TYPE_CD", MAX(AREA_INFO_SEQ) "AREA_INFO_SEQ", MAX(OP_CD) "OP_CD", MAX(CITY_CD) "CITY_CD" , LTRIM(MAX(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(IMG_TITLE, '|')), '|') "IMG_TITLES" , LTRIM(MAX(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(IMG_PATH, '|')), '|') "IMG_PATHS" , LTRIM(MAX(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(INFO_DESC, '|')), '|') "INFO_DESCS" FROM (SELECT IMG.IMG_TITLE , IMG.IMG_PATH , IMG.INFO_DESC , IMG.AREA_INFO_TYPE_CD , IMG.AREA_INFO_SEQ , IMG.OP_CD , IMG.CITY_CD , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY IMG.AREA_INFO_TYPE_CD, IMG.AREA_INFO_SEQ, IMG.OP_CD, IMG.CITY_CD ORDER BY IMG.AREA_INFO_TYPE_CD, IMG.AREA_INFO_SEQ, IMG.OP_CD, IMG.CITY_CD, IMG.DISP_ORDER) AS "ROW_ID" FROM DI_AREA_IMG "IMG" , DI_AREA_INFO "AR" WHERE IMG.USE_YN ='Y' AND IMG.AREA_INFO_TYPE_CD=AR.AREA_INFO_TYPE_CD AND IMG.AREA_INFO_SEQ =AR.AREA_INFO_SEQ AND IMG.OP_CD =AR.OP_CD AND IMG.CITY_CD =AR.CITY_CD /*DYNAMIC_KEYWORD*/
AND IMG.AREA_INFO_TYPE_CD = #area_info_type_cd#
AND IMG.AREA_INFO_SEQ = #area_info_seq#
AND IMG.OP_CD = #op_cd#
AND IMG.CITY_CD = #city_cd#
ORDER BY IMG.AREA_INFO_TYPE_CD, IMG.AREA_INFO_SEQ, IMG.OP_CD, IMG.CITY_CD ) START WITH ROW_ID = 1 CONNECT BY PRIOR ROW_ID = ROW_ID -1 AND PRIOR AREA_INFO_TYPE_CD=AREA_INFO_TYPE_CD AND PRIOR AREA_INFO_SEQ =AREA_INFO_SEQ AND PRIOR OP_CD =OP_CD AND PRIOR CITY_CD =CITY_CD GROUP BY AREA_INFO_TYPE_CD, AREA_INFO_SEQ, OP_CD, CITY_CD ) "IM", DI_COUNTRY "CON", DI_CITY "CT" WHERE A.USE_YN ='Y' AND IM.AREA_INFO_TYPE_CD(+)=A.AREA_INFO_TYPE_CD AND IM.AREA_INFO_SEQ(+) =A.AREA_INFO_SEQ AND IM.OP_CD(+) =A.OP_CD AND IM.CITY_CD(+) =A.CITY_CD AND A.CITY_CD =CT.CITY_CD AND A.COUNTRY_CD =CON.COUNTRY_CD
/*DYNAMIC_KEYWORD*/
AND A.AREA_INFO_TYPE_CD = #area_info_type_cd#
AND A.AREA_INFO_SEQ = #area_info_seq#
AND A.OP_CD = #op_cd#
AND A.CITY_CD = #city_cd#

SELECT GT.* FROM ( SELECT A.CTG_SEQ CTG_SEQ , A.CTG_NM CTG_NM , A.CTG_UPR_SEQ CTG_UPR_SEQ , A.CTG_DISP_ORDER CTG_DISP_ORDER , A.CTG_TYPE_CD CTG_TYPE_CD , A.CMS_ID CMS_ID , A.LEAF_YN LEAF_YN , A.MEMO MEMO , A.GOODS_TYPE_CD GOODS_TYPE_CD , A.AREA_CD AREA_CD , A.SUB_AREA_CD SUB_AREA_CD , A.DISP_YN DISP_YN , A.CTG_DISP_YN CTG_DISP_YN , NVL(A.CTG_DEPTH, 0) CTG_DEPTH , A.CTG_PATH CTG_PATH ,(SELECT COUNT(C.CTG_SEQ) FROM CTG C WHERE C.DISP_YN = 'Y' AND C.CTG_UPR_SEQ = A.CTG_SEQ AND C.MBL_YN = 'Y') CTG_CNT ,B.CTG_NO FROM CTG_HEADER B, CTG A WHERE B.CTG_SEQ = A.CTG_SEQ AND A.DISP_YN = 'Y' AND A.MBL_YN = 'Y'
AND A.CTG_UPR_SEQ = #ctgCode#
UNION ALL
SELECT A.CTG_SEQ CTG_SEQ , A.CTG_NM CTG_NM , A.CTG_UPR_SEQ CTG_UPR_SEQ , A.CTG_DISP_ORDER CTG_DISP_ORDER , A.CTG_TYPE_CD CTG_TYPE_CD , A.CMS_ID CMS_ID , A.LEAF_YN LEAF_YN , A.MEMO MEMO , A.GOODS_TYPE_CD GOODS_TYPE_CD , A.AREA_CD AREA_CD , A.SUB_AREA_CD SUB_AREA_CD , A.DISP_YN DISP_YN , A.CTG_DISP_YN CTG_DISP_YN , NVL(A.CTG_DEPTH, 0) CTG_DEPTH , A.CTG_PATH CTG_PATH ,(SELECT COUNT(C.CTG_SEQ) FROM CTG C WHERE C.DISP_YN = 'Y' AND C.CTG_UPR_SEQ = A.CTG_SEQ AND C.MBL_YN = 'Y') CTG_CNT ,B.CTG_NO FROM CTG_HEADER B, CTG A WHERE B.CTG_SEQ = A.CTG_SEQ AND A.DISP_YN = 'Y' AND A.MBL_YN = 'Y' AND A.CTG_UPR_SEQ = '5759'
) GT ORDER BY GT.CTG_NO
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO DI_GOODS_EVAL_POINT(GOODS_EVAL_SEQ, EVAL_ITEM_CD, EVAL_POINT) VALUES(#goods_eval_seq#, #eval_item_cd#, #eval_point#)

INSERT INTO BE_MST ( CONSULT_CD , NEXT_CONSULT_DAY , AREA_CD , SUB_AREA_CD , CONSULT_TITLE , CONSULT_TYPE_CD , EVENT_CD , RES_CD , CUST_CD , RES_NM , AGE , SEX , GRP_SPEC_CD , TOUR_PLAN_CD , SITE_CD , START_DAY , ADULT_CNT , CHA_ID , TOUR_AREA , EMAIL , PHONE_FG , HANDPHONE1 , HANDPHONE2 , HANDPHONE3 , TEL1 , TEL2 , TEL3 , CHA_DEPT_CD , SALE_ID , SALE_DEPT_CD , GRP_DETAIL_CD , JOIN_CUST_TYPE_CD , JOIN_OFFLINE , JOIN_ONLINE , FLOOR_YN , TRIP_YN , JOIN_ETC , REMARK , INS_DT , INS_ID , CANC_CD , FAX , SMS_YN , EMAIL_YN , CHANNEL_CD , TITLE_YN , INC_FG , GRP_NM , CONSULT_MST_CD , COMP_TEL1 , COMP_TEL2 , COMP_TEL3 , PROC_CD , DESC_YN , ADULT_PRICE , INS_DEPT_CD , EV_DAY_CNT , GOODS_CD , COMP_CD , INS_SITE_CD ) VALUES ( (SELECT fn_be_mst_get_seq(#inc_fg#) AS CONSULT_CD FROM DUAL), #next_consult_day# , #area_cd# , #sub_area_cd# , #consult_title# , #consult_type_cd# , #event_cd# , #res_cd# , #cust_cd# , #res_nm# , #age# , #sex# , #grp_spec_cd# , #tour_plan_cd# , #site_cd# , #start_day# , #adult_cnt# , #cha_id# , #tour_area# , #email# , #phone_fg# , #handphone1# , #handphone2# , #handphone3# , #tel1# , #tel2# , #tel3# , #cha_dept_cd# , #sale_id# , #sale_dept_cd# , #grp_detail_cd# , #join_cust_type_cd# , #join_offline# , #join_online# , #floor_yn# , #trip_yn# , #join_etc# , #remark# , sysdate , #ins_id# , #canc_cd# , #fax# , #sms_yn# , #email_yn# , #channel_cd# , #title_yn# , #inc_fg# , #grp_nm# , #consult_mst_cd# , #comp_tel1# , #comp_tel2# , #comp_tel3# , #proc_cd# , #desc_yn# , #adult_price# , #ins_dept_cd# , #ev_day_cnt# , #goods_cd# , #comp_cd# , #ins_site_cd# )

INSERT INTO DI_GOODS_EVAL( GOODS_EVAL_SEQ, GOODS_NM, GOODS_CD, EVAL_TITLE, EVAL_CNTS, EVAL_AVG, TOUR_GOAL_CD, GOODS_TYPE_CD, AREA_CD, READ_CNT, RECOMMEND_CNT, DISP_YN, CUST_CD, CUST_NM, TEL, MEMO, DEL_YN, INS_DT, INS_ID, UPD_DT, UPD_ID, COMP_CD, SATISFACTION ) VALUES ( (SELECT MAX(GOODS_EVAL_SEQ) + 1 FROM DI_GOODS_EVAL), #goods_nm#, #goods_cd#, #eval_title#, #eval_cnts#, #eval_avg#, #tour_goal_cd#, #goods_type_cd#, #area_cd#, #read_cnt#, #recommend_cnt#, #disp_yn#, #cust_cd#, #cust_nm#, #tel#, #memo#, #del_yn#, sysdate, #ins_id#, sysdate, #upd_id#, #comp_cd#, #satisfaction# )
sqlMap.select: SELECT fn_be_mst_get_seq(#inc_fg#) AS CONSULT_CD FROM DUAL
select COUNT(*) reviewCnt from DI_GOODS_EVAL where GOODS_CD = #goods_cd# AND CUST_CD = #cust_cd#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO T2EMS.EMS_MAIL_SEND (SCHD_SEQ, REG_DT, MAIL_CODE, MAIL_NM, TO_NAME, TO_EMAIL, FROM_NAME, FROM_EMAIL, SUBJECT, CONTENTS_MAPPING, MAIL_URL_MAPPING) VALUES (T2EMS.EMS_MAIL_SEND_SCHD_SEQ.nextval, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), #mail_code#, #mail_nm#, #to_name#, #to_email#, #from_name#, #from_email#, #subject#, #contents_mapping#, #mail_url_mapping#)
sqlMap.update: MERGE INTO DI_WEATHER USING DUAL ON ( COUNTRY_MAP_CD = #country_map_cd# AND CITY_MAP_CD = #city_map_cd# AND WEAT_DT = #weat_dt# ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET CITY_NM = #city_nm#, WEAT_CD = #weat_cd#, WEAT_NM = #weat_nm#, MAX_TEMPER = #max_temper#, MIN_TEMPER = #min_temper#, INS_DT = sysdate, INS_ID = #ins_id# WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( COUNTRY_MAP_CD, CITY_MAP_CD, WEAT_DT, CITY_NM, WEAT_CD, WEAT_NM, MAX_TEMPER, MIN_TEMPER, INS_DT, INS_ID ) VALUES ( #country_map_cd#, #city_map_cd#, #weat_dt#, #city_nm#, #weat_cd#, #weat_nm#, #max_temper#, #min_temper#, sysdate, #ins_id# )

MERGE INTO DI_DOM_WEATHER USING DUAL ON ( COUNTRY_MAP_CD = #country_map_cd# AND CITY_MAP_CD = #city_map_cd# AND WEAT_DT = #weat_dt# ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET CITY_NM = #city_nm#, WEAT_CD = #weat_cd#, WEAT_NM = #weat_nm#, MAX_TEMPER = #max_temper#, MIN_TEMPER = #min_temper#, AM_RAINFALL = #am_rainfall#, PM_RAINFALL = #pm_rainfall#, WIND_DIRECTION = #wind_direction#, WIND_SPEED = #wind_speed#, INS_DT = sysdate, INS_ID = #ins_id# WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( COUNTRY_MAP_CD, CITY_MAP_CD, WEAT_DT, CITY_NM, WEAT_CD, WEAT_NM, MAX_TEMPER, MIN_TEMPER, AM_RAINFALL, PM_RAINFALL, WIND_DIRECTION, WIND_SPEED, INS_DT, INS_ID ) VALUES ( #country_map_cd#, #city_map_cd#, #weat_dt#, #city_nm#, #weat_cd#, #weat_nm#, #max_temper#, #min_temper#, #am_rainfall#, #pm_rainfall#, #wind_direction#, #wind_speed#, sysdate, #ins_id# )
